name: George's Great Escape
description:
===== In association with  Kat21 and  Kit2K2 =====

===== STORY =====
George is a slime and is done sitting all day in his cave and wants to get out. He needs to get through some obstacles to escape this boring cave! Can you help him get out and see the beautiful wonders of the outside world?

===== CONTROLS =====
----- Movement-----
Space bar: JUMP
----- Other -----
Escape (ESC.): Back to main menu
